fulltext:
HƯNG NGUYỄN 
FRONT-END DEVELOPER 
MOBILE: 0908-547-477 
EMAIL: hung.nguyen@hotmail.com.vn 
SKYPE ID: minhhung98 
DETAIL: www.linkedin.com/in/nmhung 
SKILLS 
Expert in HTML/CSS, SASS, LESS, JavaScript, jQuery, React. 
Knowledge of NodeJS, Express, MongoDB. 
Adobe suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign). 
Repository: SVN, Github, Bitbucket. 
Programming and design 
EXPERIENCE 
TTA 
HCM, Vietnam 
12/2017 – Present  
SENIOR FRONT-END 
Implemented a graphic user interface CMS/products. 
Built single-page applications with JavaScript on a custom-built framework. 
Leveraged React and JavaScript to build chatbot projects. 
Developed and maintained critical components of chatbot website, 
autocomplete,  carousel,... using React components 
Develop new UI functionality for multithreaded user-facing applications 
running on touchscreen devices, using ReactJS 
Cross-browser and cross-platform compatible solutions. 
Technologies used in project: ReactJS, UX/UI, Javascript, jQuery, Bootstrap, 
Material UI, LESS, SASS, RESTful API. 
SENTIFI 
HCM, Vietnam 
04/2016 – 06/2017 
SOFTWARE ENGINEER (Front-end)  
Created template product on desktop/tablet/smartphone. 
Create and clone and fixing bugs for widgets. 
Cross-browser and cross-platform compatible solutions. 
Use Bootstrap and responsive integrate UI for multi-devices. 
Technologies used in project: UX/UI,  HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, jQuery UI, 
Bootstrap 3, LESS, SASS, Grunt, Gulp, RESTful API, ReactJS, React Native.  
APPCAMEL PTY LTD 
HCM, Vietnam 
11/2015 – 03/2016 
FRONT-END & UX/UI CUM MANAGER 
Implemented a graphic user interface CMS/products. 
Develop new UI functionality for multithreaded user-facing applications 
running on touchscreen devices. 
In charge of the office and software product management of company. 
Managing stakeholder expectation, leading and motivating the employees. 
Supervise and make sound decisions for developing product. 
Learning business, flow and scope of software production. 
VINASOURCE INC. 
HCM, Vietnam 
08/2012 – 11/2015 
FRONT-END & UX/UI DESIGN 
Cross-browser and cross-platform compatible solutions. 
Work HTML5/CSS3/jQuery/Javascript from PSD files using Photoshop, 
Dreamweaver or MS Visual Studio. 
Work with client via email directly.  
Design and develop website by wordpress. 
Contributed to the overall development of the web development team. 
Technologies used in project:  HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, jQuery, jQuery UI, 
Bootstrap 2 & 3, Wordpress. 
SEQUENT ASIA IT 
HCM, Vietnam 
03/2011 – 08/2012 
SENIOR WEB & MOBILE DESIGNER 
Design user interface for Website, iPhone and iPad.  
In charge of deploying /formatting gfx. 
Assist team members with GUI for websites, mobiles. 
PLAYSOFT 
HCM, Vietnam 
05/2010 – 02/2011 
DIGITAL ARTIST 
Design user interface for iPhone, Bada Samsung, Android and BlackBerry.  
In charge of deploying /formatting gfx. 
Using HTML/CSS for app. 
Assist team members with GUI for websites. 
TECHKNOWLEDGE 
HCM, Vietnam 
12/2007 – 01/2009 
TEAM LEADER/WEB DESIGNER 
Design mockups for websites, logos, brochure and export HTML, CSS for 
website. 
Flash / Actionscript : www.tknowledge.com is the first flash site that I have 
done by myself. 
Managing a design team. Supervise projects related design. 
Assign works for designers to complete deadline. 
Assist team members with GUI for websites. 
CLEVERLEARN 
ENGLISH LANGUAGE 
CENTER 
HCM, Vietnam 
01/2006 – 12/2007 
DESIGNER 
Design banner, brochure, flyer, print-ad, website. 
Support marketing department. 
EDUCATION 
LOTUS COLLEGE 
HCM, Vietnam 
2005 – 2006 
COMPUTER-AIDED GRAPHIC ART DESIGN 
Participated Advance Computer-Aided Graphic Art Design. 
VIETNAM 
NATIONAL 
UNIVERSITY-HCM 
HCM,  Vienam 
2000 – 2003 
THE DIPLOMA OF PROFESSIONAL TRAINING – IT 
NETWORK 
UNIVERSITY OF 
NATURAL SCIENCE 
HO CHI MINH 
HCM, Vietnam 
2002 – 2007 
Finished COMPUTER SCIENCE
